gameBlurb: Shadow Ascent is a first-person dark fantasy stealth game set in an ancient, mysterious, goblin-infested tower. Your mission as a fearless adventurer is to carefully sneak past hordes of evil goblins to steal the treasure at the top of the tower. You must explore the tower, avoid enemies and navigate through each floor to uncover the secrets hidden within and escape with their treasure. The game features simple yet intriguing mechanics, such as picking up and interacting with enemy bodies, to enhance the eerie atmosphere and challenge players. It is a perfect match for players who enjoy stealth-based puzzle games set in fantasy environments.
